body:
### Steps to reproduce

```
$ spack unit-test -k 'test_env_activate_broken_view or test_extensions'
...
============= 1 failed, 4 passed, 3022 deselected in 4.62 seconds ==============
```

This fails because `test_extensions` suddenly runs an environment aware SpackCommand that can't find certain specs in the active env.
title: Spack tests leak active environment between tests
